paper.title: On the Pricing Formula for the Perpetual American Volatility Option Under the Mean-reverting Processes
paper.abstract: This paper studies the properties of the parabolic free-boundary problem arising from pricing of American volatility options in mean-reverting volatility processes. When the volatility index follows the mean-reverting square root process (MRSRP), we derive a closed-form pricing formula for the perpetual American power volatility option. Moreover, an artificial neural network (ANN) approach is extended to find an approximate solution of the free boundary problem arising from pricing the perpetual American option. The comparison results demonstrates that the ANN provides an accurate approach to approximate solution for the free boundary problem.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究美国波动率期权的定价问题，特别是针对均值回归过程下的永久美国波动率期权，提出了封闭形式的定价公式，并利用人工神经网络方法近似解决自由边界问题。这些内容明确属于衍生品定价领域。
